title: "glutton for punishment" in more champs
body:
any chance riot will ever explore self inflicted pain mechanics in new champs/reworks

i kinda want more of the mundo/olaf like abilities.  maby something like extra tank stats the slower you get. make someone regret getting that IBG or mallet.

any thoughts on more abilities you would like to see in this category?

replies.body: I read that is gluten for punishment.
that works too, more sugary champs are needed aswell

A champion shouldn't punish you for building certain things, it's bad enough Soraka players constantly abused HP and she was changed to actually be worse with it.

%hp costs where the damage either also scales with hp or gives it back in the same amount if not more is fine. Flat health costs are fine too.

Maybe something like "gain 3% MS per 1% missing health" or "champion does 15% more damage when ability is off cooldown. Ability: gain 20% bonus MR and Armour"
